operators.sql: SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI"*p2.mass) as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1818Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 1 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI"*p2.mass) as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1745Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 2 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI"*p2.mass) as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1648Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 3 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI"*p2.mass) as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1556Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 4 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI"*p2.mass) as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1536Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 5 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep" as "timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1093Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timestep" = 13 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timestep"

logicalRa: localHaloTable: generate halo information for each group of interest using local data
